Class JsonElementWriter

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gson.stream.JsonWriter
      com.google.gson.internal.bind.JsonElementWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public final class JsonElementWriter
extends JsonWriter

This writer creates a JsonElement.
